app.name: Double Medical Check
app.subtitle: AI Medical Report Analysis
app.full_title: Double Medical Check - AI Medical Report Analysis

upload.title: Upload Medical Test Reports
upload.description: Support multiple image uploads, AI will automatically organize test data and provide diagnostic recommendations
upload.button: Click to upload report images (drag & drop supported, multiple files)
tips: Supports blood tests, biochemical tests, immunological tests, etc. (X-ray, CT, MRI, ultrasound, ECG, EEG, endoscopy, pathology reports will be supported soon)
Multiple screenshots can be uploaded, AI will automatically deduplicate and merge
Please ensure images are clear and text is readable
Supports JPG, PNG, WEBP and other formats

analysis.loading_description: Identifying test items, extracting data and generating diagnostic recommendations
analysis.loading_tip: Medical report analysis usually takes 30-60 seconds, please be patient

diagnosis.disclaimer: This analysis is for reference only, please follow doctor's diagnosis

comparison.doctor_input_label: Please enter the doctor's actual diagnosis:
comparison.doctor_input_placeholder: Please enter doctor's diagnosis, treatment recommendations, etc...

messages.no_files: Please select medical report images first

errors.ai_service_unavailable: AI service temporarily unavailable, please try again later
errors.analysis_failed: Error occurred during analysis, please retry
errors.missing_diagnosis: Please provide both AI diagnosis and doctor's diagnosis
errors.fallback_possible_conditions: AI response format error, unable to parse
errors.fallback_recommendations: Please re-upload clear medical report images

footer.copyright: Â© 2024 Double Medical Check | Powered by Google Gemini AI | For reference only, please follow doctor's diagnosis

export.title: Double Medical Check - Medical Report Analysis Results
